raw_body: EGODAGE INDRANI (SAMARANAYAKE) – Beloved wife of late Siripala Egodage,​ loving mother of Chaminda (Australia) and Samitha (Army Hospital),​ grandmother of Manuga,​ mother-in-law of Madhavee,​ sister of late Bharatha,​ late Chitrani,​ Pushpa,​ Ranjith,​ Nandene and Nalini,​ passed away. Cortege leaves residence for cremation at 5 p.m. at Niyandagala Cemetery on Saturday 26th. No. 7,​ Vidarshana Mawatha,​ Galavilawatte,​ Homagama.053750
